short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Karma Nature brings you a NewTab with beautiful backgrounds, Time, Date, Weather and Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This New Tab has new Nature backgrounds every day, a weather forecast for your region and the time and date.
It has also a searchbox for your everyday searches.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Karma Nature extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Enjoy and send us your feedback
